summary: Craftable necklaces that shroud your character in shadow while sneaking/not sneaking.
descriptionHtml:
Here\'s my second mod for Skyrim, a pair of necklaces I made for my vampire character.
These necklaces shroud your character in darkness and shadow either while sneaking or not sneaking.
The necklaces add some great effect to your character\'s assassinations/sneaking. Or if you want your character to constantly be shrouded that\'s also an option.
You can craft these necklaces under the jewelry section at the forge

Necklace of Sneaking Shadow: The holder is shrouded in darkness and their movements muffled while sneaking.

Necklace of Walking Shadow: The holder is shrouded in darkness and their movements muffled while sneaking and running.

These necklaces also add 25% chance to sneaking and can be crafted at the blacksmith under the jewelry section.

=========
Installing
=========
Extract the .esp into your Data folder
Activate ShadowNecklaces.esp through the Skyrim launcher

===========
Uninstalling
===========
Delete the ShadowNecklaces.esp from your Data folder
author: Bibeau
